sense.def:
Kadar človek
measures something
, ugotavlja, kako veliko ali obsežno je nekaj, in sicer z merilno napravo, kot je ravnilo, termometer ali tehtnica.

seg.quote: The explosive force is measured in tons.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
measures a particular distance
, določena razdalja predstavlja dolžino, širino ali globino tiste stvari.

seg.quote: ...slivers of glass measuring a few millimetres across.
Everyone is entitled to some measure of protection.

sense.def:
A measure of an alcoholic drink
je količina alkoholne pijače v kozarcu, na primer vinjaka ali viskija.

Kadar je nekaj
a measure of a particular thing
, nam pove, kako velika ali izjemna je določena stvar.

seg.quote: It is a measure of their achievement that the system has lasted so long.

sense.def:
Measures
so tudi dejanja, ki jih storijo pooblaščeni ljudje, da bi dosegli določene rezultate;

seg.quote: Measures had been taken to limit the economic decline.

sense.def:
Kadar človek nekaj naredi
for good measure
, to naredi poleg vsega drugega.

seg.quote: The waiter had taken away the plates, and, for good measure, had removed his glass.

sense.def:
Oseba ali stvar, ki
measures up
, je prav tako dobra, kot smo pričakovali.

seg.quote: The repair failed to measure up to their standards.
